basicInfo.name: Coco
basicInfo.flavor: Having mastered the secret technique passed down the family line for generations, Coco is finally ready to face the cats. \"With lightning coursing through my body, they won't dare bite me!\

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Hamster Ninjutsu
Skill 1.desc:
Self
 - Grants Quintuple-Target Attack Resistance [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Quintuple-Target Attack Resistance to 20%.

Skill 2.name: Lightning Shuriken
Skill 2.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 245% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 75% chance to inflict Shock. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 245% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Static Electricity
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Effect Resist Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Effect Resist Boost to 34%.

profile.story:
You want information on Aisha?
Then, come to this renowned hamster ninja!
My family is famous for having produced countless ninjas!
Among them, I passed the ninja test with the best score!

basicInfo.name: Coco
basicInfo.flavor: After countless failed attempts at payback, despair nearly overtook Coco, but then he met Jin. Moved by Jin's quiet dedication to training, he decided to follow suit.

basicInfo.name: Coco
basicInfo.flavor: Coco is a ninja hamster with inferior skills compared to his other siblings. He is constantly harrassed by the cats nearby and is training to get revenge.
